summary.title: Professional Summary
summary.content: Full-Stack Developer with 9 years of experience building and maintaining web and mobile applications. Skilled in developing with Laravel and React, with additional experience using Vue 2+, Node.js, and relational databases such as MySQL and PostgreSQL. Focused on delivering maintainable, efficient code and contributing to both frontend and backend components across diverse projects.

details.description: Developed a web app for managing income, expenses, customers, contracts, payroll, and a board that streamlined the process of purchasing materials, tools, and office supplies of medium-sized companies using Laravel 10, React 18, and ChartJS, with some automated tests using Cypress.
Built a website for a building company and its administrative panel using Laravel 11 and React 18.
Developed a web app to manage employees and generate reports and documents that they request using Laravel 11 and React 19.

Developed several frontend features for a web application for managing documentation, including creation, modification, review, and navigation of documents changes using Vue 2, Apollo, TypeScript, Nuxt, Graphql, Storybook, and Cypress.
Built and extended websites adding some pages, search and navigation features created with October CMS version 2 and 3.
Developed an October CMS plugin to manage newsletters for one website.

Updated a website and a web application to manage events between sellers and buyers that a company organizes, including seller registration and automated notifications, using Laravel 8, React, Tailwind, and Inertia.

Developed a web application to manage sales processes, visualized on a board and a chat for the communication of the players using React, Redux, GO.js, and Azure Chat, also created a proxy that connected with other company web service to get the data for the board using NodeJS and Express, configured and deployed on Azure.
Built pages and features to an e-learning platform using React, Next and Redux Saga.
Built views to mobile apps using React Native and Styled Components.
Developed a web application to manage civil works progress and documentation, including sketch creation and photo organization using Laravel 6, Vue 2 and Vuetify.

Developed an Android app to track work progress and maintain photographic record, integrated into documentation generation, reducing significantly the time it took to create documentation, using React Native.

Provided support and updates to several projects that belonged to a company that offers tools and material to schools using Laravel version 5.3 and 5.4, JQuery, Dio, and React, deployed on Elastic Beanstalk instances.
Developed features to recognize objects in images and videos using AWS Rekognition and translate them to other languages using AWS Translate.
Created a chatbot to practice multiplication tables using Botpress, and developed additional chatbots using NodeJS and Dialogflow
Built and updated websites using WordPress, CSS, and Bootstrap for medium and big companies.
Developed some features to several web applications created in mainly Laravel and other frameworks and languages.
Developed a web application for a training company to manage customers, trainers, courses, payments, and reports; using Laravel 5.5, VueJs 2, Vuetify, Snappy PDF, and Maatwebsite Excel.
Developed search tools, email modules, and other features for web applications built with .Net, C#.
Optimized several queries in SQL Server to enhance performance
Developed billing modules and other features in a Windows Desktop application for a company that sells beauty products with several branches, and put it into production.
Provided client support and resolved issues with the application.

Developed a web application to manage business information, including CRUDs of employees, clients, providers, and inventory; also modules for managing salaries and loans, requests for vehicles and tools, expense justifications; construction site locations on Google Maps and monitoring; using Laravel 5.2 and VueJS 2+.
Created a web app to estimate costs of works and generate the respective documentation, reducing time and effort in documentation generation, using Laravel.

Developed an Android application to manage and collect data about field work, captured geotagged photos, and synchronization with the server, payments, and authorization notifications of purchases using Java and Android Studio.
Built the company's website using PHP and Sass.
Modified a web application created with CodeIgniter that was used to print construction plans based on saved measurements.
